name: Air Mega
description:
Air Mega is a space shooter game for my portfolio. It's an action game that the objective is to defeat the enemies' ships and in the end, the boss, to save the planet.

      This project has the objective to show my programming experience and practice, but obviously that you will have a good time of fun with this game.

      If you're interested, come on and play it and, please, give me some comments about what do you think that I need to improve. Your feedback is so much important.

Thank you and have fun!
